name: com.seanba.super-tiled2unity
description: Imports Tiled Map Editor assets into Unity

samples.description: Simple overhead map. Uses a custom depth sort axis for sprite that can move behind columns.
Tiled map using tiles animated by Aseprite.

samples.displayName: Tileset Atlas (Fixing Seams with Sprite Packer V1)
samples.description: Uses a Tileset Atlas to easily add tiles (and their sprites) to a Unity sprite atlas (V1). Use this to resolve seams in-between tiles. Works with Unity 2020.3 and later with Sprite Packer V1.

samples.displayName: Tileset Atlas (Fixing Seams with Sprite Packer V2)
samples.description: Uses a Tileset Atlas to easily add tiles (and their sprites) to a Unity sprite atlas (V2). Use this to resolve seams in-between tiles. Requires Unity 2021.3 or later and Sprite Packer V2.
